segments.advisor_message: So, let’s jump right in. What are some of your main objectives today? Anything specific you wanna tackle or discuss?
segments.client_message: Um, yeah, I guess, I really wanna talk about saving for my kid’s college, and maybe some other like, investment stuff. I dunno, just some goals I have in mind.

segments.advisor_message: Gotcha! College savings is a big one, for sure. Are there any other topics or goals you’ve been thinking about?
segments.client_message: Oh, right! I also, like, want to make sure I’m saving enough for retirement. I’ve heard that’s super important, right?

segments.advisor_message: Absolutely! Retirement is key. So, just to recap, we’re looking at college savings and retirement planning today, right?
segments.client_message: Yup, exactly! I just wanna make sure I’m doing everything right. Thanks!
